entries.title: Reviewer buys 16TB portable SSD for $70, proves it’s a sham
70% of drugs advertised on TV are of “low therapeutic value,” study finds
entries.description: Ads often tout new, pricey drugs that are not much better than old, cheaper ones.

entries.title: “Talented but crazy”: Potential jurors give court their opinions on Elon Musk
entries.description: Jury selection in Tesla trial proceeds as Musk lawyer expresses "grave concerns."

entries.title: More malicious packages posted to online repository. This time it’s PyPI
entries.description: It's not always easy to spot malicious impostors posing as legit downloads.

entries.title: Game makers stage mass exodus from Dungeons & Dragons’ “open” license
entries.description: WotC is "an existential threat to our game," one publisher says.

entries.title: Tesla staged 2016 self-driving demo, says senior Autopilot engineer
entries.description: The claim was made in a lawsuit over Walter Huang's fatal Model X crash in 2018.

entries.title: Fire of Love revisits tragedy of French volcanologists who died in 1991
entries.description: Married French volcanologists perished in eruption of Japan's Mount Unzen in 1991.

entries.title: Google plans AirTag clone, will track devices with 3 billion Android phones
entries.description: Google recently made the world's largest device-tracking network; now it has a tag.

entries.title: The physics behind building an enduring soap bubble
entries.description: Physics models and real-world experiments help keep bubbles from popping.

entries.title: RNC loses complaint claiming Gmail spam filter is biased against Republicans
entries.description: FEC found "no reason to believe" that Google used spam filter to help Democrats.

entries.title: Din Djarin seeks forgiveness for his sins in The Mandalorian S3 trailer
entries.description: "Our people are scattered like stars in the galaxy."

entries.title: Bin, app, and subscription combo pledges a cleaner kitchen, environment
entries.description: Food waste is a big problem in the US. Is a Wi-Fi-equipped trash can a solution?

entries.title: UK lawmakers vote to jail tech execs who fail to protect kids online
entries.description: If passed, UK online safety bill could jail tech leaders for up to two years.

entries.title: New M2-powered MacBook Pros and minis have 8K video, Wi-Fi 6E, dozens of cores
entries.description: The hardware is quite familiar, but you can pack in a whole lot of power.

entries.title: Looming Twitter interest payment leaves Elon Musk with unpalatable options
entries.description: Purchased for $44 billion, company is likely worth as little as $15 billion today.

entries.title: The Chevrolet Corvette gets all-wheel drive hybrid power for 2024
entries.description: When the hybrid 'Vette goes on sale later this year, it will be the quickest of them all.

entries.title: A history of ARM, part 3: Coming full circle
entries.description: In our series finale, ARM achieves its goal of bringing computing power to the masses.
